fields.name: Autoplay
fields.instructions: Autoplay the slideshow.

fields.name: Autoplay Timer
fields.instructions: Set the delay in seconds for how long to stay on each slide. You can use one decimal, for example 2.5. If set to 0, it will default to 4 seconds.

fields.name: Background Color
fields.instructions: Override the page background color.

fields.name: Bleed
fields.instructions: Set the image, slideshow or video to bleed off either one or both edges of the viewport. Be careful using this on pieces that are not at either edge.

fields.name: Classes
fields.instructions: Add additional classes to the item's main div.

fields.name: Custom Code
fields.instructions: Enter custom html, css or javascript.

fields.name: Default Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`). For example, the default if left blank is: `"Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif`.

fields.name: Default Font Line Height
fields.instructions: Enter a numeric value (with two decimals if you like). The default is `1.5`. If left at `0`, the default is applied.

fields.name: Default Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: Display
fields.instructions: Choose how to render the structure.

fields.name: Entries
fields.instructions: Add the entries you want to show up on this post.

fields.name: Favicon
fields.instructions: You can technically set favicons for each and every size to correspond with iOS device homescreens and so forth—however, the lazy, but smart approach is to accomodate most devices with one size. 152x152px. Upload your favicon image here, ideally a 152x152px png.

fields.name: Google Analytics Tracking ID
fields.instructions: Enter your Google Analytics Tracking ID (UA-XXXXXXXX-X) here to enable tracking of the site.

fields.name: Grid
fields.instructions: Set the grid item width. The grid has 12 columns, use them wisely.

fields.name: H1 Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`).

fields.name: H1 Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: H2 Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`).

fields.name: H2 Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: H3 Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`).

fields.name: H3 Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: H4 Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`).

fields.name: H4 Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: H5 Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`).

fields.name: H5 Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: H6 Font
fields.instructions: Paste or enter your font family override using CSS standards (excluding `font-family:`).

fields.name: H6 Font Size
fields.instructions: Enter standard CSS values only—for example `16px`, `1rem` or other font sizing units that are CSS standard.

fields.name: Header Line Height
fields.instructions: Enter a numeric value (with one decimal if you like) for H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6. The default is `1.1`. If left at `0`, the default is applied.

fields.name: Height
fields.instructions: Enter any standard CSS value like 50%, 20px, 20em and 3rem, 10vw or 20vh. It's important to define the number and the unit without spaces.

fields.name: Indicator
fields.instructions: Select the slideshow indicator type.

fields.name: Layer
fields.instructions: Layer the item on top or below other content that is pulled on top/below.

fields.name: Limit
fields.instructions: Limit the number of entries to pull in from the selected structure.

fields.name: Link Color
fields.instructions: Override link color.

fields.name: Link Hover Color
fields.instructions: Override link hover color.

fields.name: Logo
fields.instructions: Paste your SVG code in this box. Only paste the code between the <svg></svg> tags.

fields.name: Max Height
fields.instructions: Set the slideshow maximum height.

fields.name: Menu Background Color
fields.instructions: Set the background color of the menu.

fields.name: Menu Link Color
fields.instructions: Set the menu link color.

fields.name: Menu Link Hover Color
fields.instructions: Set the menu link hover color.

fields.name: Menu Text Color
fields.instructions: Set the menu text color.

fields.name: No Padding
fields.instructions: Removes half the gutter on the sides of the grid item.

fields.name: Not Fluid Width
fields.instructions: Set the row to not be fluid width, meaning not filling the viewport past a certain resolution.

fields.name: Offset
fields.instructions: Set the grid offset from the left.

fields.name: Page Loader
fields.instructions: Use page loader for when navigating the site. This isn't necessary, but can briefly stimulate the impatient crowd.

fields.name: Pull
fields.instructions: Floats the content either left or right. Does not work in masonry rows.

fields.name: Pull Up Below
fields.instructions: Works like top-aligned, but pulls content below up to start immediately after the row.

fields.name: Shadow
fields.instructions: Adds a drop shadow to the image or video.

fields.name: Show Arrows
fields.instructions: Show the navigation arrows.

fields.name: Slideshow Type
fields.instructions: Set the slideshow type.

fields.name: Structure
fields.instructions: Select the structure to pull in.

fields.name: Style
fields.instructions: Add style attributes to the item's main div.

fields.name: Text Color
fields.instructions: Override page text color

fields.name: Top Aligned
fields.instructions: This will make the content start at the top of the viewport.

fields.name: Web Font Snippets
fields.instructions: Add your external web font code snippets here (these are css stylesheet links).

relabel.instructions: This is your poster/fallback. Without it, the video loop will not work.
This will be your thumbnail. If you add video (below), this will be the video poster/fallback, and the scale of the video is dictated by the dimensions of the thumbnail image.
